column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Which of your competitors do you expect to pose the biggest challenge to your candidacy ? Why ?
#Text=What makes you the most desirable of all candidates running in the riding ?
#Text=Most of the other candidates are promoting more government , more inefficiencies and consequently higher taxes .
#Text=I consider none of them competitors as their goal is diametrically opposed to my own .
#Text=Only the candidate for the Freedom Party has similar goals to my own and I consider him a colleague working toward the same end as myself , namely much less government and much lower taxes .
#Text=I 'm the most desirable candidate in the riding , because of my goals of much less government and much lower taxes .
#Text=What do you feel are the three most important issues to voters in your riding ?
#Text=Are these the same top three issues that are most important to you ?
#Text=What would you do to address these issues ?
#Text=Too Much Government :
#Text=The main issue in Kitchener-Conestoga is over regulation by government .
#Text=This is the cause of the problems in education and health care ; its even the major cause of poverty and youth crime .
#Text=All regulations are enforced by coercion and the rich and powerful always arrange to direct the coercion at the poor or the powerless .
#Text=To solve problems , we need to use cooperation not compulsion .
#Text=We need to adopt the approaches used by other jurisdictions that have dealt with problems successfully without resorting to government regulations .
#Text=Farmers and Manufacturers :
#Text=Our people are knowledgeable and hard-working .
#Text=If government gets out of their way , they 'll do just fine .
#Text=The Environment : In Earth in the Balance , Al Gore admitted : "

#Text=The most serious examples of environmental degradation in the world today are tragedies that were created or actively encouraged by governments  .
